website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost wax warmer aimed at the removal of "peach fuzz" and other fine hairs, though some users say it also removes more stubborn hairs.
pros: blinking light indicates that the machine is working
Temperature dial gives the user more control
cons: Some users say the wax gets too hot

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described. Easy to set up and use. Directions said it would melt the wax in 45 minutes and it was accurate! I could have probably begun using a little earlier. You can see the waxes progress without removing the lid. I actually bought the tin wax and just took the bucket out and put the tin in it and it worked perfect. Wax is warm when applied but no where near hot enough to burn. Once you have melted the wax you just have to turn to medium to prevent it from hardening. Overall this is a great little warmer!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Combs

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first 10 minutes and then it turned off. I read the instructions that it came with and it said that it was "normal" for the light to turn on and off but then the wax started hardening and now it won't turn on at all!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This thing gets boiling hot on the lowest setting. My cousin bought the same one and has the same problem I definitely would not recommend unless you want blisters from getting burned.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Meeseeks

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase! It heats up relatively fast, and I really like the bar across the unit that you can scrape off the excess wax. I noticed some reviews say the warmer doesn't work properly because the light goes out...the deal is this: the warmer shuts itself off automatically when the wax is to the temperature you set it to, and turns itself back on if the wax starts to cool. I bought wax beans from Amazon to use in the warmer. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Rumour

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a wax warmer for personal use for some time. The previous reviews on this was helpful. I liked that the silver bar could be removed so I can access the wax better. Also, the can of wax I purchased (Gigi hard wax) fit inside of the bowl just right so I don’t have to put wax directly into the bowl. It heated very well and was easy to use. I am not a professional but I felt very capable of using this product without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Aigne' C

customer_reviews.title: Gets way to hot!
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this wax heater. It gets much too hot and doesn’t have a good low temperature even with the lowest setting, I continually have to shut it off and then turn it back on before the wax gets hard. Maybe if someone doesn’t have sensitive skin it would work for them but it doesn’t work for me. It burns my skin.
customer_reviews.author: BBall

customer_reviews.title: great product, keeps my wax warm and does the job
customer_reviews.text: yup, it melts wax. I guess for the money, it had better at least do that. I like the removable pot for those that may have the wax tins that you can stick directly into the melting pot. Then you can keep two different waxes separate, if you're one of those people that does both hard/soft wax. I understand that some wax tins are larger intentionally so that you will have to buy the company's melting pot, so be wary of that before purchase of this + any other tin of wax. Easy to clean if you spill inside, between the pot and the inner pot, it's nearly impossible to do though.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with cirepil hard wax. I’ve used it about 4 times and it’s been great! I usually turn it up as high as it goes to melt the wax and then turn it off. Once the wax cools down and thickens up, I turn it back on to the lowest setting. Overall, good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Works just not very well.
customer_reviews.text: The temperature is really weird and inconsistent. The beads either melt really hot or it's too thick to wax with. I'm disappointed so far so i wouldn't recommend. If you heat it up fast then let cool on your spatula then maybe you can wax really fast with the beads. I'd send it back but it sounds like a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Did not work upon receiving DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I tried to turn it on and I test it, it turned off. LISTEN TO THE REVIEWS BUY A DIFFERENT BRAND!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jar0706

customer_reviews.title: Temperature issue
customer_reviews.text: Ended up with minor burn marks all over my leg. The wax would either be too hot, or when I'd let it cool slightly it'd be too thick. There seemed to be no in between.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Michaux

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after third use
customer_reviews.text: This thing got extremely hot and I had to turn it down to let the wax cool and then turn it up because it cooled too much. Then it straight up died after the third time I used it. Return window is closed so I wasted my money. I plug it in and turn the knob and it doesn't work at all. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great for home use
customer_reviews.text: I like to do beauty stuff on my own rather than paying someone to do it, so this was a must buy. It works well, heats up well, and is relatively easy to clean. I use it with sugaring wax and have had no issues. To clean I heat up whatever is left, scoop out as much as I can, let it cool, and then use a Lysol wipe to clean the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Avril

customer_reviews.title: It has worked really good with my hard wax beeds
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad to say that this little thing has worked for me 100% I was sorta iffy to want to buy it at 1st since I did see a lot of reviews that said that it stoped working for them after 1st use or so. I’ve had this for a couple months now and it’s still working at it’s full capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: It takes a while to get the wax melted
customer_reviews.text: It takes a while for the warmer to melt the wax. I plugged it in and I came back to it later and the light was off. I thought it was defective but I later realized that it turns off to avoid overheating. It does this even though the wax is not completely melted. My Gigi warmer was completely different and much faster. But overalls it’s ok. Just give yourself enough time for the warmer to melt the wax.
customer_reviews.author: Patm66

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit with one exception.
customer_reviews.text: We use this on a biweekly basis and have found that it heats the wax very good. It also maintains the temperature very good. The one complaint we have is that the cover is not stable and falls off the unit too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - and Didn't Last Very Long - Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a Satin Smooth Wax Warmer, and to be fair paid more for it. I only changed to a new one because I was moving home and thought I could treat myself to a new one - big mistake. This one felt cheap as soon as I received it, but I thought, well I only use it mainly for underarms and a few other little places, so it should be okay. I was wrong - this warmer only lasted about 6 months before it would not heat up whatsoever. Very disappointed. I have learnt my lesson and now bought another Satin smooth Warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat sucks. Get ready to melt...YOUR SKIN
customer_reviews.text: Awful warmer. Thermostat does NOT WORK...it just gets hotter and hotter after it gets to temperature...my wax is supposed to be heated at 90degrees and i have to keep this thing on the lowest setting. And eventhen i sometimes have to switch it off cause it getsbto hot even with frequent stirring
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Some of the units doesn't hold temperature. Be sure to remove wax from unit after it melted
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I got 2 of them, but I ordered just one. First one was working fine, but it got messed up with wax when I used it first and after that I had to throw it away. It was kind of my fault not thinking it thorough. Second unit working awfully, it doesn’t hold the temperature. It works for a few seconds and then turns off
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeniya

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient machine, I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and does the job wonderfully. I use this with Kolua wax beads and I'm saving money all over the place doing my own waxing, 5 stars it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: All you need for home use
customer_reviews.text: I have had other wax warmers and this one is perfect at a decent price. The metal bar is quite helpful to regulate the amount of wax on your applicator. I am using a can of wax from the local store and simply placing it in the warmer's "pail" that's provided. So, far, I have only used the warmer once.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya Creates

customer_reviews.title: 5 months in and it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product at first. It worked well, the wax got hott; everything was good. However, five months in and this product has stopped working. I cant return it because the return date has passed, I don't want to buy a new one, and to top it off I'm going to go to the concert with bushy eyebrows. I'm frustrated because this product had such good reviews. I guess next time I have to really read the bad ones so I can have a warning of what's to come.
customer_reviews.author: Carop Wieland

customer_reviews.title: Not what’s described
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this. It’s not easy to clean and not easy to remove wax without a giant mess. Really disappointed for my wax melter
customer_reviews.author: amber martin

customer_reviews.title: WAS WORTH MY DOLLAR!!!😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying a at home wax warmer for myself and this definitely got the job done I love it so much!!! On the instructions it said that it could melt wax in about 45 minutes but it melted mines in less than 5 minutes!!! I would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My first time waxing at home, because I needed to save money. This product is great. Affordable, easy, and the leftover wax is easy to keep clean for next time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This works great. My girlfriend got it for me so she could wax my eyebrows and beard line. I don’t suggest using it for your nads as the wax is a little hotter than I could handle. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The light shorts out every now and then and it gets REALLY hot. Even on the lowest setting. Kinda annoying when I'm waxing and I keep having to turn it off and on to keep the wax at the right consistency. But for the price, it don't mind. I don't wax enough to pay $50 for a wax melter 😀
customer_reviews.author: Austin & Shelby K

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It works great. You can adjust the temperature to whatever you like. As explained in the instructions, it takes around 45 minutes to warmup, and the light turns on and off during the usage. I’ve used it several times now and I think it works great. Great price for a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Angelyca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Only takes at the most 5 minutes to melt my wax! 😊 But it do have to turn it off to let the wax cool off to use it on my skin or else it's too hot!
customer_reviews.author: Jausleighn whitmore

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend it though
customer_reviews.text: This warmer is okay. The cord is only about 2 feet which makes it difficult because I can’t put it directly on the floor from my outlet so I have to put a stool under it if I want to wax my legs on the bathroom floor. The letters came off when I was cleaning my pot to remove the wax lol and the heating isn’t accurate. It shuts off and gets cold, not sure why. But overall it’s usable . I wouldn’t recommend it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wax warmer. I actually use as a paraffin warmer because I don’t have a big space in my pedicure station. Is perfect and the temperature setting is great. I highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Isabel P.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this wax warmer! Goes perfect with the newer wax beads that don’t hurt as much as any wax I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Friendly-Great for students
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this is awsome wax warmer when I was in cosmetology school! I've had it for almost a year now and it still works great. Its easy to use, reasonably priced and reliable. I suggest it for students and at home use.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Barnhill

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Had it for less then a year and it doesn’t work anymore. Started by heating on and off and then just eventually never turned back on.
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean, good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wax machine from my husbands Amazon account. It works really well. I could put the hot wax tin directly in the heater and did not have to transfer it in the bucket. (This made cleaning easy) It does take 40 mins to heat, but once it’s hot, it regulates the temperature well. I was very happy with the product. I have used it twice in the last two months.
customer_reviews.author: Ronak Sanghvi

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: I got this product delivered little late ! Got this wax warmer as it's not feasible to go parlors and get waxing done. Iam totally disappointed! The temp controls are not working and fluctuating high in lowest setting.. It's very risk and chances of burns . So be careful !
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Thirunagari

customer_reviews.title: so far works very well the only bad thing is the light goes on and off
customer_reviews.text: ive only had this for about a week so we’ll see...so far works very well the only bad thing is the light goes on and off. that being said it still works at the temperature it’s supposed to be on whether the light is on or not but again it’s only been a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quality
customer_reviews.text: This works well. Heats up quickly and has lasted 3 years now. I love using this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great! Wish i could just find a good wax to use in this.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wax melter.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to home waxing and this wax melter is perfect for the job. It does take a while to melt wax but the wait is worth the end results. And it is nice looking. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Flammer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot! I was previously using the GiGi wax pot but I could not keep the outside of the pot wax free. I ordered this one and there is a cover and plenty of room so wax is not spilling over onto the burner. Will definitely be getting this again if needed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Heather simpson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the DIY waxer
customer_reviews.text: Wife has been using this thing for a while. Says she has saved a ton of money by waxing her own armpits. This dude has been going strong for a long time now.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Cox

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a good friend of mine. Since it was a gift I didn't try it before and my friend tried it a few weeks later...she told me it never turned on, never warmed wax. Felt so bad as it was a gift for her. So I basically gifted her a non-working wax warmer, by the time she told me it was too late to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Most convenient pot i ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Just barely turn it on and it melts hard wax. Like the little wire that crosses the pot. Finally an easy way to clean my wooden stick.
customer_reviews.author: rhubarb jones

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not this product is awesome! It works like a professional wax warmer minus the hefty cost. The heat settings work like they are supposed to and the directions are clear and concise as to what setting you need to use in order to get optimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Review Updated: They sent me a new one! I have now used this warmer multiple times and it has not failed me yet! I wish I could be a little more precise with the temperature, but that might just require more practice with it. Great product! Previous Review: I bought it in April, used it once and now in August it won't turn on and I can't return it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Pettersen

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: The temperature gets super hot, not sure why anyone would need it to go that high. Found some tips for temps online useful. I am satififed with it overall
customer_reviews.author: SaraLovesAmazon77

customer_reviews.title: Clearly used
customer_reviews.text: I just took out of the box and there's wax in it! Is this a joke?!!
customer_reviews.author: zainab

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I love the heat control settings. It's cute and doesn't take up much space. I do wish it came with custom fit collars.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: It works as described.
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect size, easy to control the temperature, I used it only once but, I already fell in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ines

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Heats fast after initial beads are.mealted. have used several times, still working great.
customer_reviews.author: blahblah

customer_reviews.title: I would like to return this and get a refund. It broke immediately and did not work.
customer_reviews.text: It broke in a couple of uses and stopped working. I would like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Shivani Shah

customer_reviews.title: I used it for hard wax
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning to work with hard wax, this heater melted all the wax in ~15-20 minutes. I switched it off and waited ~3 minutes to cool before use. 14 oz is probably best for small areas, however, I didn't have an issue with the amount for legs. Plus, if I needed more I just poured in more wax to melt. So the size of it worked fine!
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah I really liked this product until I went to use it for the second time and it’s already broken...I ordered it less than a month ago and only used it once for 5 minutes the first time. The heater won’t come on at all until I put it to about 80 now...and I can’t use that temp because I have extremely sensitive skin and will 100% burn myself. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sjsldjklsdflkjdsfsd

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heats quickly, but it melted my counter even though it's lifted off and there's padding underneath
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: Gets way to hot no matter what setting you use
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Parker

customer_reviews.title: Get exactly what you want for a change
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says it will do and keeps the wax at a temperature that will not burn skin.
customer_reviews.author: Forensic Evaluation

customer_reviews.title: Portable, works
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expe ted but works well, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A.

customer_reviews.title: Great little warmer.
customer_reviews.text: Great little warmer. Easy to use. I keep the wax in it all the time, when it's time to wax I plug it in and turn it to medium low and off we go.
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. First time using did not work. Oh well 😐
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Worked once.
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in and worked once. Plugged it in a second time stopped working, no heat no light. Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: BootyJunk

customer_reviews.title: Works great after months of use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an at home wax kit & was surprised it has worked so well .definatly a great buy
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Soooo good!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. I wax pretty frequently and it’s exactly what I needed. It’s pretty decent size and heats up the wax pretty quickly, I really like that you can control the heat temperature and cover the area where the wax goes with a lid. I recommend getting this because it’s really easy and doesn’t make a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Definetly keeps wax melted
customer_reviews.text: Best wax warmer I’ve had so far. It keeps all the wax liquid the entire time. The light does go on and off but it doesn’t affect anything that i can see. Update it’s been a month and it’s stuck on high heat. There’s no invetween but i guess it still works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my first warmer and I love it. Works well with canned wax
customer_reviews.text: This is my first warmer and I love it. Works well with canned wax. I had to line the inside with wax paper so that i don't get wax all over it.
customer_reviews.author: CerwinaA

customer_reviews.title: Works great, especially with wax beads
customer_reviews.text: Works great, especially with wax beads. It only took minutes to melt and not the 45 minutes as described on the instructions. Just stir a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just wish it had better temperate control
customer_reviews.text: Works well would recommend it to anyone! Just wish it had a few cooler settings because it starts off pretty much at 60 degrees Celsius.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: Used this product about 4 times, and it has totally stopped working. Worked great the first 4 times, now I can’t even get it to turn on. The light comes on and it acts like it will work but than just turns off and won’t bone back on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my wax WAY too hot.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time using my heater and it makes the wax scalding hot! Even though I am heating it on the lowest setting. I'm very disappointed. I havent even used it enough to get my money's worth out of it, but the wax gets so hot you cant even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Ellwein

customer_reviews.title: Good wax warmer. Cleaning can be a bit challenging
customer_reviews.text: Good wax warmer for using at home. Temperature control is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tonmoy

customer_reviews.title: Love it. 😍😍😍 I usually get Brazilian waxing so ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. 😍😍😍 I usually get Brazilian waxing so im custom to waxing which it makes it even easier to use this...
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S.

customer_reviews.title: More than expected and an excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: It only takes 2 min to heat your wax. More than expected and an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far, everything came in contact! product works as described within instructions.The wax beads took about 30-45 mins to fully melt. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: After using it a complete week, it turns on/off randomly. Ok for the price. *** would not repurchase ***
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is as good as any wax warmer we've used that costs two or three times as much. It heats quickly, cools quickly, the lid allows you to keep the wax in the pot without getting anything in it, and it has a bar that you can use to remove excess wax from the stick without making a mess. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Cates

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is a good product for its value
customer_reviews.author: Sumit

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works faster for hard wax hardly 5 mins, for soft wax had to heat for 45 mins on high setting
customer_reviews.author: Sri Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It warms but its easy to get messy and hard to clean
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Never worked.
customer_reviews.text: It did arrive.....-__- but didnt work. I've had it since sept but hadn't used it till TODAY and it doesn't turn on. I'm highly dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Nothing more to say. Wax can be very gooey at times to this machine does a good job at keeping it all within the cup. Heats up fairly quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: unhappy costumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Heats quickly and comes with useful instructions and tips..
customer_reviews.author: khaden

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean and store when not using
customer_reviews.text: Used it 5 times now. Very easy to clean and store when not using.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great warmer
customer_reviews.text: I love this it’s so neat and pretty for my station. The wax heater will turn it self off when the wax reaches whatever temperature you set it to then turn back on when it needs to. Idk but I just love energy-saving things
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working nearly 2-3 months after I bought it. It used to warm the wax well earlier but now, no matter how much I heat it- doesnt keep my wax warm ar all! Go for a better product that will last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for a week, It works great so far. Melts the wax without any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Deejunk

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Didn’t even melt the wax before it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working the first time I used it. It barely started melting the wax beans and it stopped working. Plugged it into other outlets in the house and nothing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jourdan.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Melted wax faster then I thought it would. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tabzter

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this product its keep the wax very hot even in the lower temperature
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: Works great so good value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, you plug it and then it warms up the wax. The top lid is convenient also to warm faster or keep the warmth. The tin inside is useful when you want to use a lot of wax otherwise for smaller areas it is too big.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had it less than 3 months and just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Used it once for 10 minutes slightly melted my was then would never turn on again. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Price was great takes At least 3 hours to heat although the directions tell you 1 hour
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This item is a little larger than expected but it's super cute and holds a looooot of wax. I used wax beads and it did the job just fine! Make sure you read the instructions the light will turn on and off as it is warming but that is completely normal. And then make sure you set it to medium temperature as you are waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: A good product with a very good price. The main issue with the product is it is very difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alok Rao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well,this works out for the wax I have that has a lower melting point
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare to clean
customer_reviews.text: I know wax can be messy but I have never had this much difficultly with cleaning. I had such Hope.
customer_reviews.author: A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I found it to be more of a hassle to use them other products.
customer_reviews.author: megan hull

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: This quit working in 6 months, it won’t stay on or it starts to melt the wax then just shuts off completely. It’s completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: k.elaine

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really good product and works excellent with wax beads
customer_reviews.author: Emilove

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. The metal bar at the top of the container is what makes this product different from the other ones available, helps get the excess wax off the applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Makartt Hair Removal Machine Hard Hot Wax Warmer Melter Heater Electric Depilatory Waxing 14 oz W-01
feature_bullets: ✩(Wax Not Include)Economical Hair Removal Machine :In Summer, the economical MAKARTT wax melter is great gift for your family and friends to remove their unwanted hair. What’s more it can melt most wax format including hard wax, soft wax, 14 ounce wax cans, loose wax, bricks bikini wax kits, microwavable wax kits and hair waxing kits.

✩Quality Matters : Quality for wax warmer vary on market. The difference between MAKARTT hair removal tool and markets are for the 100% copper wire and molded in update durable ABS heat assistant material and strengthen inner pot.

✩Adjustable Temperature with Indicating Light: The wax warmer equips a wide range of temperature from 60 to 110 Celsius,speeding up the wax warming in a nice consistency.Auto-shut-off function in high temperature remains the wax in liquid but not overheat.

✩See-through Cover and Removable Liner Bucket:: The see-through cover generates the heat on the wax, accelerating the wax melting and preventing the wax contamination by dust.The bucket with removable bucket handle also helps it easy to clean up the wax without dripping.
✩Money-and-Time Saver: The wax heater offers you an amazing salon-like home hair removal treatment with easy quick and safe operation, helping you save time and money.
